author: Charlotte O'Leary
method: Place the soya margarine, soya milk, icing sugar and cocoa in a bowl over a saucepan of simmering water.  Stir well until the icing is smooth and glossy. Remove it from the heat and let it cool completely, then use to ice your cake.
ingredients: 55g/2oz soya margarine,  3 tbsp soya milk,  200g/7oz icing sugar,  30g/1oz cocoa powder
